abstract: After considering inflation, the debt crisis and budget cuts, the European Central Bank and Bank of England did not take any action on interest rates.
snippet: After considering inflation, the debt crisis and budget cuts, the European Central Bank and Bank of England did not take any action on interest rates.
lead_paragraph: The European Central Bank and the Bank of England kept their main interest rates unchanged Thursday, as inflation concerns were overshadowed by debt tensions and the fear that government spending cuts could crimp economic growth.

headline.main: European Central Banks Keep Rates Steady
headline.print_headline: Europe Keeps Interest Rates Steady on Concern About Economic Growth

byline.original: By Jack Ewing and Julia Werdigier
